fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Competition, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation, External Relations, Climate Action
inter_groups: European Energy Forum (EEEF)  - monitoring of the group activies
eu_initiatives:
Big Data, Environmental, Agriculture, international cooperation, marine strategy and climate change, energy. 
This year I would like to focus on the agriculture and cooperation EU-Ukraine, use of Big data in the agricultural sector.
relevant_communication: Underwater marine life protection. Underwater sound working sub-group (OSPAR). Organic Farming in cooperation with non-EU countries, Ukraine in particular
goals__remit: Public affairs and relations with public authorities. Monitoring and providing expert advice on developments and trends in the European policy and legislation, mainly on marine environmental and agricultural issues; Cooperation with Third countries.
